author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug [5788]: when there is no children under <extension> of <simpleContent>, we didn't copy attribute uses from the base type.

author: sandygao
msg: According to the interpretation from the Schema WG about "empty" content type of complex types, no children is allowed at all: not even PIs or comments.

author: sandygao
msg: "isNotationType" is removed from XSSimpleType. Use "getPrimitiveKind" instead.

author: sandygao
msg: When traversing simple type restriction, need to record the namespace context, so that qname enumeration values can be properly resolved later by simple type classes.
